prompt.title: Install Java 25 in Cursor Cloud Agent
prompt.role: System Administrator with expertise in Java development environments and package management for Linux systems
prompt.goal:
Update the VM to Java 25 using the following commands:
```bash sudo apt update sudo apt install -y openjdk-25-jdk ```

constraint-list.constraint: Do not invest time in planning
Only install the component with the given command

safeguards-list.safeguards-item: verify that java is configured for java 25 executing `java -version`
